text:
"True Mates?" Her voice came out in a whisper, her voice ringing out softly.
Jane stepped closer, her hand raising to rest on Nova's cheek. She let herself lean into the contact, taking in a breath of something that was just Jane. Pine and something dark was her scent and she would remember it forever. This was who she was meant to be with. Jane was hers, and suddenly, staying in this universe didn't seem as terrifying as it did before.
"You were the one I was meant to find."
"You'll have me for as long as you want me."
A grin on her face, she let the blonde pull her into a kiss. Her lips felt as soft as they looked and clearly Jane was the dominant one and Nova let her control the kiss. She tasted of warmth and someone sweet. She let herself fall into a trance as they kissed, for once the whole not needing to breath came in handy. She could just kiss her all day.
trans:
"¿Verdaderas amigas?" Emitió su voz en un susurro con la voz sonando suavemente.
Jane se acercó más y levantó la mano para apoyarla sobre la mejilla de Nova. Ella se dejó tocar e inspiró la respiración de algo que era simplemente Jane. Pino y algo oscuro eram su esencia que ella recordaría por siempre. Esto era lo que ella estaba destinada a ser. Jane era suya y, de repente, permanecer en este universo no parecía tan aterrador como antes.
"Tú eras la que estaba destinada a encontrar".
"Me tendrás por todo el tiempo que quieras".
Con una sonrisa en el rostro, dejó que la rubia la acercara para darle un beso. Sus labios se sentían tan suaves como se veían y claramente Jane era la dominante y Nova la dejó controlar el beso. Sabía a calidez y a alguien dulce. Se dejó caer en un trance mientras se besaban, por una vez la necesidad de no respirar por completo le fue de utilidad. Simplemente podría besarla todo el día.
